description: This file defines an authentication page component for a Next.js application, handling user sign-in and sign-up workflows, including form rendering, state management, and routing.

methods.name: AuthPage
methods.description: React functional component that renders the authentication form and manages sign-in/sign-up logic.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Asynchronous function handling form submission, performing login or signup based on current mode, and routing upon success.
